mapper.select: SELECT ch.* FROM qzgz_canteen_history ch LEFT JOIN qzgz_canteen c ON c.id=ch.canteen_id WHERE to_days(ch.date) = to_days(now())+#{plusDay} ORDER BY c.id

SELECT id,`name`,type,MAX(zao) AS zao,MAX(zhong) AS zhong,MAX(wan) AS wan,MAX(ye) AS ye FROM (SELECT c.id,c.`name`,c.state,c.type, CASE WHEN ch.meal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS zao, CASE WHEN ch.meal = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS zhong, CASE WHEN ch.meal = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS wan, CASE WHEN ch.meal = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ye FROM qzgz_canteen c LEFT JOIN (SELECT meal,canteen_id FROM qzgz_canteen_history WHERE TO_DAYS(date) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) + 1) ch ON c.id = ch.canteen_id) AS a GROUP BY id,`name`,state,type
SELECT c.id,c.`name`,c.type,ch.meal,ch.date FROM qzgz_canteen_history ch LEFT JOIN qzgz_canteen c ON ch.canteen_id = c.id WHERE TO_DAYS(ch.date) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) + #{plusDay} ORDER BY ch.meal,c.type
